channel.title: R on Exploring Data
channel.description: Recent content in R on Exploring Data

item.title: Health Tweet analysis
item.description:
Project idea There are different health tweets from different news agencies. This health tweets from bbc, cbc,and many more. The data is publicly available here.
Data pre-processing I will start by reading the all the 16 health tweets from news agencies. library(dplyr) library(tidyr) library(purrr) library(readr) library(ggplot2) library(textdata) theme_set(theme_bw()) raw_text <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/yihunzeleke/data_repo/master/raw_text.csv") raw_text ## # A tibble: 63,327 x 4 ## newsgroup date text id ## <chr> <date> <chr> <dbl> ## 1 bbchealth 2015-04-09 Breast cancer risk test devised http://bbc.
